description:
The Holiday Inn Express Hotels app makes it easier than ever to research, book and manage your stay at Holiday Inn Express Hotels and the entire IHG family of brands.

From within the app you can also enroll in IHG® Rewards Club to earn Reward Nights and other extras. We are now the only hotel company that rewards you when you explore more of our family of brands. When you stay at multiple IHG brands, you can fast track to Gold Elite or Platinum Elite status. Gold Elite members will be offered free internet in 2013 and in 2014 we will also be the only program to offer free Internet to all members at every one of our hotels. 

App Features: 
- Book stays at any IHG hotel 
- Manage upcoming stays with easy contact and directions to hotel 
- Receive special offers and discounts from IHG 
- Be secure with our Best Price Guarantee – our promise that the best hotel room prices for any IHG property can be found here or on our website(s) or your first night is free. 
- Get special rates using your corporate ID 
- Learn about the unique services and hallmarks for each of the IHG's eleven brands 
- Use IHG® Rewards Club Points to redeem free Reward Night stays 
- Monitor your fast track to Elite status levels 
- Virtual card that recognizes your status level to use when you check in
releaseNotes:
Anywhere Check-In: Check in before you arrive and we will notify you when your room is ready.*
* Push notifications required to receive reminders.
Anywhere Check-Out: Check out at your convenience from the palm of your hand.
Booking Made Easier
Quickly rebook past stays.
Use your current location to find hotels near you… or choose a new destination.
